message:
It seems they're widening the beta for the last couple of days.  Mark and I just both got invitations.

I'm not at all sure I'll be taking them up on it, though…

I made a point of making myself eligible for the beta (though I forget how, or if I dreamt the whole thing) but when you put it like that, maybe you're right. Maybe this is worth waiting to experience in a more complete state.

Well, supposedly you were supposed to be a PS+ member.  Which I'm not.

For the record, I also haven't even glanced at the U3 beta.  For similar reasons.
